project_descr: Project ReBUILD: Resilience Capacity Building for Cities and Municipalities to Reduce Disaster Risks from Climate Change and Natural Hazards, Phase 1

outputs.output_descr: The Project will address the institutional capacity and individual competency gaps on climate/disaster risk management of key players in the cities and municipalities surrounding two (2) target river basins in Regions 2 /3 & 6

project_title: project rebuild: resilience capacity building for cities
